default.n_instances_per_type:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?type (COUNT(?s) AS ?instanceCount)
WHERE {
    ?s rdf:type ?type .
}
GROUP BY ?type
ORDER BY DESC(?instanceCount)
default.n_instances_per_property:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?property (COUNT(?s) AS ?instanceCount)
WHERE {
    ?s ?property ?o .
}
GROUP BY ?property
ORDER BY DESC(?instanceCount)
default.property_values:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?property ?value (COUNT(?s) AS ?usageCount)
WHERE {
    ?s ?property ?value .
}
GROUP BY ?property ?value
ORDER BY ?property DESC(?usageCount)
default.subjects_with_property:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?subject
WHERE {
    ?subject ?property ?o .
    FILTER(?property = <PROPERTY_URI>)
}
ORDER BY ?subject
default.objects_with_property:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?object
WHERE {
    ?s ?property ?object .
    FILTER(?property = <PROPERTY_URI>)
}
ORDER BY ?object
default.objects_with_type:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?object
WHERE {
    ?s ?p ?object .
    ?object rdf:type <TYPE_URI> .
}
ORDER BY ?object
default.subjects_with_property_value:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?subject
WHERE {
    ?subject ?property <VALUE_URI> .
    FILTER(?property = <PROPERTY_URI>)
}
ORDER BY ?subject
default.objects_with_property_value:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?object
WHERE {
    ?s ?property ?object .
    FILTER(?property = <PROPERTY_URI> && ?object = <VALUE_URI>)
}
ORDER BY ?object
default.objects_with_type_and_property:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?object
WHERE {
    ?s ?property ?object .
    ?object rdf:type <TYPE_URI> .
    FILTER(?property = <PROPERTY_URI>)
}
ORDER BY ?object
default.objects_with_type_and_property_value:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?object
WHERE {
    ?s ?property ?object .
    ?object rdf:type <TYPE_URI> .
    FILTER(?property = <PROPERTY_URI> && ?object = <VALUE_URI>)
}
ORDER BY ?object

feasible_queries.count_composition_year:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

SELECT ?year (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated)) AS ?year)
}
GROUP BY ?year
ORDER BY ?year
feasible_queries.count_composition_decade:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

SELECT ?decade (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  BIND(FLOOR(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated))/10)*10 AS ?decade)
}
GROUP BY ?decade
ORDER BY ?decade
feasible_queries.distinct_years:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT (YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated)) AS ?year)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
}
ORDER BY ?year
feasible_queries.count_compositions_composers_decade:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

SELECT ?decade (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions) (COUNT(DISTINCT ?composer) AS ?numberOfComposers)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  ?composition schema:composer ?composer .
  BIND(FLOOR(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated))/10)*10 AS ?decade)
}
GROUP BY ?decade
ORDER BY ?decade
feasible_queries.count_compositions_persons_decade:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX nfdicore: <https://nfdi4culture.de/ontology#>

SELECT ?decade (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions) (COUNT(DISTINCT ?person) AS ?numberOfRelatedPersons)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  ?composition nfdicore:relatedPerson ?person .
  BIND(FLOOR(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated))/10)*10 AS ?decade)
}
GROUP BY ?decade
ORDER BY ?decade
feasible_queries.count_compositions_composer_decade:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

SELECT ?decade ?composer (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  ?composition schema:composer ?composer .
  BIND(FLOOR(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated))/10)*10 AS ?decade)
}
GROUP BY ?decade ?composer
ORDER BY ?decade DESC (?numberOfCompositions)
feasible_queries.count_compositions_composer_name_decade:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

SELECT ?decade ?composer ?composerName (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  ?composition schema:composer ?composer .
  OPTIONAL { ?composer schema:name ?composerName . } # Attempt to get human-readable name
  OPTIONAL { ?composer rdfs:label ?composerName . }  # Fallback to rdfs:label if available
  BIND(FLOOR(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated))/10)*10 AS ?decade)
}
GROUP BY ?decade ?composer ?composerName
ORDER BY ?decade DESC (?numberOfCompositions)
